paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant TTR-V142I, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: Congestive heart failure, hereditary ATTR amyloidosis

individual_records.phenotype_details: Congestive heart failure, diagnosed with hereditary ATTR amyloidosis
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing demonstrated a heterozygous TTR-V142I mutation consistent with hereditary ATTR amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The TTR-V142I variant is associated with hereditary ATTR amyloidosis, leading to cardiac symptoms.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and genetic testing
variants.additional_notes: The patient showed improvement after treatment with tafamidis.
key_quotes: Genetic testing demonstrated a heterozygous TTR-V142I mutation consistent with hereditary ATTR amyloidosis.
He started tafamidis with continued improvement and no more CHF exacerbations or hospitalizations.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR variant was extracted successfully.
